snippet.title: Sonic Omens - Episode 1-4 (All Cutscenes)
snippet.description:
Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/Sonic2020/469351
Discord server: https://discord.gg/rnXJyqA
_________________________
Intro - 0:00
Ep 1 - The Breakthrough - 00:15
Ep 2 - Temple of Sands - 06:55
Ep 3 - White jungle - 10:05
Ep 4 - Shadow of water - 13:15
Credits - 17:25
 
Sonic Omens will be released in episodes format.

This fan game tells the story of why chaos emeralds are no longer used in recent Sonic games. What events took place after Sonic Unleashed before Sonic Lost World, which prevents the characters from using chaos emeralds?
Which secrets have temples of Chaos Emeralds?
_________________________
Music composers:
John_R1se - https://www.youtube.com/c/JohnR1se/videos
TechnoCinema - https://www.youtube.com/user/TechnoCinemaMusic/videos
